verbose_text: It grows slowly, about one centimeter per year with little tendency to local invasion and low risk of metastases.2 Giant BCC represents less than 1% of all BCCs and can be more invasive locally with higher risk of metastases.1 The nodular subtype is considered the most common among the giant BCCs, followed by the infiltrative subtype.2 Vitiligo is a common skin disease among the world population, characterized by achromic skin macules.
evidence: slowly, about one centimeter per year with little tendency to local invasion and low risk of metastases.2 Giant BCC
